repository.description: Sample JavaScript tasks demonstrating Ratchet capabilities including API integration, data processing, and streaming operations
repository.name: Ratchet Sample Task Repository

tasks.author: Ratchet Contributors
tasks.description: A simple mathematical task that adds two numbers together and returns both sum and product. Demonstrates basic input validation and arithmetic operations.
tasks.label: Addition Task
tasks.name: addition

tasks.author: Ratchet Contributors
tasks.description: Fetches current weather data from external APIs with support for multiple cities. Demonstrates HTTP integration, error handling, and flexible response formatting.
tasks.label: Weather API Task
tasks.name: weather-api

tasks.author: Ratchet Contributors
tasks.description: A minimal test task that simply echoes the input. Useful for testing task execution pipelines, validation workflows, and integration testing.
tasks.label: Dummy Task
tasks.name: dummy-task

tasks.author: Ratchet Contributors
tasks.description: Retrieves OAuth access tokens from Microsoft Azure AD using client credentials flow. Demonstrates secure authentication patterns and token management for Microsoft services integration.
tasks.label: Microsoft OAuth Token Retrieval
tasks.name: ms-oauth-token

tasks.author: Ratchet Contributors
tasks.description: Demonstrates making HTTP REST API calls to external services. Shows proper error handling, response parsing, and HTTP status code management.
tasks.label: REST API Call Sample
tasks.name: rest-call-sample

tasks.author: Ratchet Contributors
tasks.description: Demonstrates real-time progress reporting during task execution with streaming updates. Shows how to implement long-running operations with user feedback.
tasks.label: Streaming Progress Example
tasks.name: streaming-example

tasks.author: LLM Assistant
tasks.description: Retrieves CVE information from NVD API and returns flattened, usable data
tasks.label: CVE Retriever
tasks.name: cve-retriever
